column3: investigation Stage - Cases pending Investigation from previous Year (3)
column4: investigation Stage - Cases reported during the Year (4)
column5: investigation Stage - cases withdrawn by govt. during investigation (5)
column6: investigation Stage - cases not investigated or in which investigation was Refused (6)
column7: investigation Stage - cases Declared false on Account of mistake of Fact or Law (7)
column8: investagation Stage - cases in which charge sheets were submitted (8)
column9: investigation Stage - cases in which charge sheets were not laid but final report submitted during the year (9)
column11: Investigation Stage - Cases pending investigation at the end of the year (11)
column12: Trial Stage cases - pending trial from previous year (12)
column13: Trial stage cases - sent for trial during the year (13)
column14: Trial stage cases - withdrawn by govt. during trial (14)
column15: Trial Stage - Total cases for trial during the year (15)
column16: Trial stage - cases compounded or with drawn (16)
column17: Trial stage - Cases in which trial were completed (17)
column19: Trial stage - cases acquitted or Diascharged (19)
column20: Trial Stage - Pending trial at the end Year (20)
